name: Michaela Farova
body:
My name is Michaela Farova and I am currently studying computer engineering at University of Waterloo. Technology has always amazed me and thus I was drawn to studying it further. I enjoy coding and designing in my spare time as well as other hobbies such as painting, rock climbing, reading and gaming.

I have started a personal website in Feb 2005 and still manage it to show off my art and code. Feel free to take a look: [inlimite.com](http://inlimite.com)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
